name: 1080° Avalanche
overview: Danger is the name of the game in 1080° Avalanche. Huge air, massive drop-offs, deep powder, and the nastiest tricks come together in one package. It's a frantic race to the bottom of the mountain, so stick tricks on the way down to increase your rider's speed and power. Keep your eyes peeled for shortcuts, rockslides, natural wildlife, dizzying drops, and sudden weather changes. The successor to the Nintendo 64 version of the game, 1080° Avalanche offers a wide variety of play modes, challenges, and secrets to keep you on your toes.
